entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 08:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -42.2°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
